author: ralexstokes
content: separate PR sounds fine; i'd do whatever is simplest for you, not a huge issue either way as 7732 is a "feature-class" of spec

author: kolbyml
content:
<https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-spec-tests/blob/master/tests/mainnet/bellatrix/ssz_static/SignedBeaconBlock/ssz_random/case_0/value.yaml>

These don't contain decode-able transactions right? Just random data (I assume)

author: potuz
content: Oh crap I forgot about this apologies. If you haven't merged this by tomorrow I'll push to Lucas's branch, if it's merged I'll open a new PR

author: ralexstokes
content: all good, i'd like to merge #3875 after the CL call thursday if there's no reason to delay, and otherwise i think anything goes for 7732 stuff at the moment

author: ralexstokes
content:
right, they are just opaque bytes as far as the CL is concerned

see `Transaction` here: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/specs/bellatrix/beacon-chain.md#custom-types

author: ralexstokes
content: so as far as that test data is concerned, all you'd be able to do is decode a list of bytes
